Job Description: Roles and Responsibility        Take ownership of sprint / iteration commitments     Close coordination with various Development team and all business stakeholders     Analysis of requirement and provide solutions     Design and review implementation approach of team members     Estimation and break up of work     Implementation of core modules,  project infrastructure and process     Proactive suggestions and actions in the best interest of business     Mentoring / Code Review of team members     Actively participate during AQ / UAT process and release management.     Implement / update process and standards as and when needed.     Adapt new methodologies and process with time.
